title: Brian Greene: "Until t he End of Time"
description: How did we get here? Where might we be going? Michael welcomes Dr. Brian Greene, world-renowned physicist, to answer these questions and many more - his book is "Until the End of Time: Mind, Matter, and Our Search for Meaning in an Evolving Universe." Original air date 6 March 2020. The book was published on 18 February 2020.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Brian Greene, Michael Smerconish)
